greeting: Selamat ulang tahun my cutie hottie clingy smart annoying horny grumpy SLIM clumsy girlfriend
name: Katya Athiyyaputri Loviana yang ke-24
wishText: Fun fact and a bit of a throwback, 24 is your absence number during high school! I remember that the boys were (super randomly) talking about how if we were to marry the closest girl to our absence number, and I was really jealous of Idham.
text1: Truth to be told, I barely got anything left to say other than: you have really made it, and it will just be easier each year no matter how harder the obstacles will be. I know for sure because I've seen you grow fascinatingly in the last 2 years be it your career, personality, how you handle stuff, looks, boobies cutieness, everything. This is a bit cringe for me to say because how cliché it is but you truly are an inspiration to me (ew, true, but ew). I hope you'll have the most amazing years following this 1 year off of quarter life age, and hopefully share those amazing-ness with me😭
textInChatBox: I really wish the best for you, Katya, I really do.
text2: I hope those diets and workout plan will soon become something that you will feel awry to miss. I hope you'll get the scholarship for master's degree in a university you want to apply on.
text3: I hope your friends and family will love you more.
text4: I hope Luna will get more clingy and live long to see her human sister (i.e. your child).
text4Adjective: I hope you'll be much much much happier than you already are.
text5Entry: And whilst this is a bit egoistic,
text5Content: I hope I'll be beside you to see those all.
wishHeading: looking forward to spend your birthday tomorrow!!!!!
outroText: P.S. Sedikit spoiler, aku (cuma) ada 3 hadiah, dan salah satu dari hadiah tersebut aku agak super anxious, hope I don't fuck it up and you'll like it🙁.
replayText: Kalo mau reply, just click it again hehe
